name: Professional Business Website Template
description:
This template is made with HTML, and is easily customisable if you know what you are doing. To edit the html documents, right click on them then press "edit with"... it is recommended that you use notepad++ to edit the HTML code.

WARNING! If you delete any of the folders or documents within the project, it may cause the website to be faulty, as it cannot run with missing code. If you delete any of the folders and/or documents it is up to you to recover them, as it is not my responsibility.
